On February 4th, 2017, Black Sabbath takes the stage in Birmingham, the city where it all began, to play the 81st and final gig of the tour and bring down the curtain on a career that spanned almost half a century. The cameras are taken into the heart of the action, getting up close and personal with the band as they perform genre-defining hits, from 'Iron Man' to 'Paranoid' to 'War Pigs', among others. The special also features a studio performance of some of their songs not played on the tour.(n)

programme.title: Bipolar Rock 'N' Roller
programme.desc: A raw and unflinching account of Mauro Ranallo's decades-long struggle with Bipolar Affective Disorder. The voice of WWE and Showtime Championship Boxing, Ranallo has called some of the biggest sports events in history - all the while fighting his own epic battles with mental health. Follow his journey as he combats the stigma behind mental health issues and sheds light on what it's like being at the top of the industry despite seemingly insurmountable odds.(n)

programme.title: Drunkboat
programme.desc: A young teenager, Abe (Jacob Zachar), manipulates the unsuspecting help of his alcoholic Uncle Mort (John Malkovich) to buy a boat from a con man named Mr. Fletcher (John Goodman).(n)

programme.title: Don't Sleep
programme.desc: Shawn and Zach are young lovers who move into a guesthouse together on an estate owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marino. When bizarre events begin to occur, Zach slowly remembers a forgotten time in his childhood when he suffered from severe and violent psychosis - memories erased by a series of electroconvulsive shock treatments administered by his psychiatrist. As the terrors surrounding their lives grow to deadly proportions, Zach is forced to question his own sanity.(n)

programme.title: Pork Pie
programme.desc: A trio of accidental outlaws travel the length of New Zealand in a yellow Mini, protesting conformity and chasing lost love, with a posse of cops and a media frenzy hot in their pursuit.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, Major (Scarlett Johansson) is the first of her kind - a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals. Terrorism has reached a new level that includes the ability to hack into people's minds and control them, but Major is uniquely qualified to stop it. As she prepares to face a new enemy, Major discovers that she has been lied to: her life was not saved, it was stolen. Now she must figure out who created her.(n)

programme.title: A Woman, A Part
programme.desc: Maggie Siff stars as Anna Baskin, an exhausted workaholic actress at a crossroads. She abruptly extricates herself from a successful but mind-numbing TV role, returning to a life she left behind with ex-creative partners Kate (Cara Seymour) and Isaac (John Ortiz). Director Elisabeth Subrin examines the media's portrayal of women, the nature of friendship and the difficulties of reckoning with change.(n)

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first.(n)

programme.title: Don't Sleep
programme.desc: Shawn and Zach are young lovers who move into a guesthouse together on an estate owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marino. When bizarre events begin to occur, Zach slowly remembers a forgotten time in his childhood when he suffered from severe and violent psychosis - memories erased by a series of electroconvulsive shock treatments administered by his psychiatrist. As the terrors surrounding their lives grow to deadly proportions, Zach is forced to question his own sanity.(n)

programme.title: Like Father Like Son
programme.desc: Hank is assigned to write his first 'Santa Monica Cop' episode, much to the chagrin of co-workers Terry and Hugh. Levon tries to bond with Melanie while Hank sits in on a casting session. And as Charlie hopes to fix things with Marcy, Karen gets ready to throw in the towel.(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Dicks
programme.desc: Levon hopes for some alone time with Melanie but three's a crowd with The Director in the way. Money troubles add to Charlie and Marcy's marital unrest, but new client Goldie may put Charlie back in the black. Hank, Levon and Julia celebrate Julia's new role.(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: The Scarehouse
programme.desc: Two years after a tragic accident, six girls are invited to a party inside an elaborate Halloween funhouse. Once inside, they realize the true purpose of the event: to torture them as part of a revenge scheme. Corey and Elaina have spent their entire time in jail planning the elaborate payback since being solely blamed for the accident two years prior. As the night goes on, they all realize there is more to the scandal and cover-up than previously thought.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, Major (Scarlett Johansson) is the first of her kind - a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals. Terrorism has reached a new level that includes the ability to hack into people's minds and control them, but Major is uniquely qualified to stop it. As she prepares to face a new enemy, Major discovers that she has been lied to: her life was not saved, it was stolen. Now she must figure out who created her.(n)

programme.title: Gambler's Ballad: The Legend of Johnny Thompson
programme.desc: This film explores one of the greatest magicians and magic minds in history, Johnny Thompson. He teaches fellow magician Penn Jillette his signature piece called Gambler's Ballad.(n)

programme.title: Starring David Ogilvy, Anton Chekhov and Gluten Enteropathy
programme.desc: Thom makes a commercial in Beverly Hell - it's Dante with craft services. Also: furious elves, a Rolls Royce, idiots in bikinis and public urination.(n)

programme.title: Stake Land
programme.desc: When an epidemic of vampirism strikes and his family is slaughtered, young Martin (Connor Paolo) is taken under the wing of a grizzled, wayward hunter (Nick Damici) whose new prey are the undead. Simply known as Mister, the vampire stalker takes Martin on a journey through the locked-down towns of America's heartland, searching for a better place to call home while taking down any bloodsuckers that cross their path.(n)

programme.title: Fair Haven
programme.desc: A young piano prodigy returns to his family farm, after a long stay in a gay conversion therapy, and is torn between the expectations of his emotionally distant father and the memory of a past, loving relationship he's tried to bury.(n)

programme.title: Employee of the Month (2006)
programme.desc: A slacker box boy (Dane Cook) at a New Mexico superstore tries to impress a gorgeous new coworker (Jessica Simpson) by transforming himself into a model corporate drone, but runs up against the previous 17-time holder (Dax Shepard) of the store's "employee of the month" honor.(n)

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.(n)

programme.title: Dean
programme.desc: Demetri Martin plays an illustrator who falls hard for an LA woman (Gillian Jacobs) while trying to prevent his father (Kevin Kline) from selling the family home in the wake of his mother's death.(n)

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought.(n)

programme.title: The Sense of an Ending
programme.desc: Tony Webster (Jim Broadbent) lives a reclusive existence in London, until he learns that a diary has been left to him by the recently deceased mother (Emily Mortimer) of an ex-girlfriend (Charlotte Rampling). As Webster investigates the diary, he is forced to face the truth about his first love and the consequences of decisions made a lifetime ago, while attempting to resolve his strained relationships with his ex-wife (Harriet Walter) and their pregnant daughter (Michelle Dockery).(n)

programme.title: Walking Out
programme.desc: Once a year, fourteen-year-old David (Josh Wiggins) travels from his mother's home in Texas to visit his loner father, Cal (Matt Bomer), in the remote mountains of Montana. There, the two embark on their annual hunting excursion, during which the taciturn Cal attempts to connect with his smartphone-addicted son. But when a terrifying turn of events leaves Cal critically wounded, it's up to the teenage David to summon enough strength for both of them.(n)

programme.title: Jasper Jones
programme.desc: Toni Collette, Hugo Weaving, Levi Miller, Angourie Rice, Dan Wyllie and Aaron McGrath star in the story of Charlie Bucktin, a bookish boy of 14 living in a small town in Western Australia. In the dead of night during the scorching summer of 1969, Charlie is startled when he is woken by local mixed-race outcast Jasper Jones outside his window. Jasper leads him deep into the forest and shows him something that will change his life forever, setting them both on a dangerous journey to solve a mystery that will consume the entire community.(n)

programme.title: Lynyrd Skynyrd: If I Leave Here Tomorrow
programme.desc: Featuring rare interviews and never-before-seen archive, this documentary takes viewers on a trip through the history, myth and legend of the greatest American rock band ever. Rising from the swamps of the Deep South, the good ol' boys from Jacksonville, FL came to define an era with their hard rocking boogie-woogie sound, their drunken and dangerous antics and their controversial use of the rebel flag. The film also serves as a portrait of band leader Ronnie Van Zant.

programme.title: School Ties
programme.desc: In the 1950's, a talented quarterback (Brendan Fraser) from a working class Jewish family earns a scholarship to a prestigious New England prep school, but must keep his religious faith a secret from his blue blood classmates. Matt Damon and Amy Locane costar in this period drama.

programme.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Steven Spielberg directs this follow-up to the original. Academy Award nominee Jeff Goldblum returns as Ian Malcolm, who is convinced by Academy Award winner Richard Attenborough to return to the land of the dinosaurs and rescue his girlfriend, played by Academy Award nominee Julianne Moore. When Malcolm arrives on the island, he stumbles into even more danger and action.

programme.title: Martin Lawrence Live: Runteldat
programme.desc: Comic actor Martin Lawrence ("Big Momma's House," "Black Knight") returns to his stand-up roots with this hilariously confessional concert that serves up stinging doses of social commentary and plenty of dishy revelations about his personal troubles. A tour-de-force comedy performance from a movie star who proves he's still got serious chops on a live stage.

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man
programme.desc: Elliot, his girlfriend Sasha, and their friend John move into an old house off campus for their last year in college. Almost immediately, Sasha begins to suspect there is something wrong with the home, and enlists her clairvoyant friend Kim to hold a séance. Prompted by a clue in the house, they attract the attention of The Bye Bye Man, an insidious supernatural figure who deceives and preys upon his victims before causing them to turn on those around them.

programme.title: School Ties
programme.desc: In the 1950's, a talented quarterback (Brendan Fraser) from a working class Jewish family earns a scholarship to a prestigious New England prep school, but must keep his religious faith a secret from his blue blood classmates. Matt Damon and Amy Locane costar in this period drama.

programme.title: Daisy
programme.desc: A thirteen-year-old girl named Daisy (Hattie Gotobed), who suffers from terminal Epidermolysis Bullosa, meets Stinky (Max Brown), a British war veteran and drug addict. Like Peter Pan, Stinky is stuck in Neverland and like Wendy, Daisy inspires him to change his ways - helping him learn to appreciate life, find hope and find the kind of love that she knows she will never get to experience.

programme.title: Terms of Endearment
programme.desc: Hard-to-please Aurora (Shirley MacLaine) is looking for love, while her daughter (Debra Winger) has her own set of family problems. Also starring Jack Nicholson.

programme.title: Pork Pie
programme.desc: A trio of accidental outlaws travel the length of New Zealand in a yellow Mini, protesting conformity and chasing lost love, with a posse of cops and a media frenzy hot in their pursuit.

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: James Clayton is one of the top prospects in the new crop of CIA recruits. Clayton is given a special assignment and must root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the Agency.

programme.title: Marshall
programme.desc: In 1940, long before he sits on the US Supreme Court or claimed victory in Brown v. Board of Education, Thurgood Marshall (Chadwick Boseman) is a young rabble-rousing attorney for the NAACP. Marshall explores one his greatest challenges in those early days: the case of black chauffeur Joseph Spell (Sterling K. Brown), accused by his white employer, Eleanor Strubing (Kate Hudson), of sexual assault and attempted murder.

programme.title: All I See Is You
programme.desc: After being blinded as a child in a nearly fatal car crash that claimed her parent's lives, Gina depends on her husband James to be her eyes. She sees her world in her own imagination with help from James' descriptions. Despite her disability, the two enjoy a colorful existence in Thailand. It seems the only real hardship this loving couple faces is difficulty conceiving a child, but when Gina is given the opportunity to have a corneal transplant and regains her vision, their life and relationship are upended.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: This highly acclaimed, Oscar® winning independent drama marked the extraordinary sophomore effort of writer and director Sofia Coppola, who crafts a resonant, understated drama about a movie star (Bill Murray) visiting Tokyo to appear in a liquor commercial, who befriends the lonely, hotel-bound wife (Scarlett Johansson) of a celebrity photographer. Together, the two lost, culturally adrift, insomniac Americans become platonic soul mates, exploring the city and discovering a kindred spirit to combat their shared isolation.(n)

programme.title: Leaving Las Vegas
programme.desc: Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood talent rep, loses his job because of his drinking. Despondent, he goes to Las Vegas to end his life in one final binge. But on the Strip, his plans are interrupted when he meets Sera, a street-smart hooker. Ben and Sera's chance meeting becomes a respite on the road to oblivion as these two disenfranchised souls form a bond that is as mysterious as it is immutable.(n)

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: James Clayton is one of the top prospects in the new crop of CIA recruits. Clayton is given a special assignment and must root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the Agency.(n)

programme.title: All I See Is You
programme.desc: After being blinded as a child in a nearly fatal car crash that claimed her parent's lives, Gina depends on her husband James to be her eyes. She sees her world in her own imagination with help from James' descriptions. Despite her disability, the two enjoy a colorful existence in Thailand. It seems the only real hardship this loving couple faces is difficulty conceiving a child, but when Gina is given the opportunity to have a corneal transplant and regains her vision, their life and relationship are upended.(n)

programme.title: Avenge the Crows: The Legend of Loca
programme.desc: The pendulum of revenge is set in motion when an assassin named Joker is released from prison. His orders from the Reyes Ricos prison gang are to take down Loca, an ex-gang member who once ran the powerful Los Grajos crew. Now Loca makes her living pushing drugs, and maintains a watchful eye on her young cousin, Cammy, the only family she has left. Although she is cunning and street smart, Loca doesn't see Joker coming, and he attacks Cammy to lure her out of hiding.(n)

programme.title: Marshall
programme.desc: In 1940, long before he sits on the US Supreme Court or claimed victory in Brown v. Board of Education, Thurgood Marshall (Chadwick Boseman) is a young rabble-rousing attorney for the NAACP. Marshall explores one his greatest challenges in those early days: the case of black chauffeur Joseph Spell (Sterling K. Brown), accused by his white employer, Eleanor Strubing (Kate Hudson), of sexual assault and attempted murder.(n)

programme.title: Confidence Game
programme.desc: With the field narrowed down to The Big Five, the campaigns spread their game across the country and play to their strengths - with eyes squarely focused on the all-important upcoming prize: Super Tuesday.(n)

programme.title: The Reckoning
programme.desc: With big wins for the frontrunners on Super Tuesday the rest of candidates are reckoning with the results. But the biggest story of all might be one both Democratic and Republican establishments can agree on: how do they stop Trump?(n)

programme.title: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: It's make or break time for Rubio, Kasich and Sanders. As the candidates pin their hopes on Florida and Ohio, can they gather enough momentum to force a brokered convention - or will their campaigns finally run out of steam?(n)

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful (La vita e bella)
programme.desc: Guido is a charming, bumbling Jewish waiter whose colorful imagination and playful spirit help him to woo a beautiful schoolteacher. The couple marries and has a young son, but before long, their idyllic world is threatened by Nazi soldiers who force the family into a concentration camp. Guido must now use his imagination again - this time to transform his son's tragic new surroundings into a magical wonderland.(n)

programme.title: Henry Rollins: Keep Talking, Pal.
programme.desc: Henry Rollins waxes at a high rate of speed about the brilliance of RuPaul, meeting David Bowie, his weirdest shows, why women should rule and more in a live performance from Portland, Oregon.(n)

programme.title: Employee of the Month (2006)
programme.desc: A slacker box boy (Dane Cook) at a New Mexico superstore tries to impress a gorgeous new coworker (Jessica Simpson) by transforming himself into a model corporate drone, but runs up against the previous 17-time holder (Dax Shepard) of the store's "employee of the month" honor.(n)

programme.title: Chef
programme.desc: When Chef Carl Casper (Jon Favreau) suddenly quits his job at a prominent Los Angeles restaurant after refusing to compromise his creative integrity, he is left to figure out what's next. Finding himself in Miami, he teams up with his ex-wife (Sofia Vergara), his friend (John Leguizamo) and his son (Emjay Anthony) to launch a food truck. Taking to the road, Chef Carl goes back to his roots to reignite his passion for the kitchen for life.(n)

programme.title: Assault on Precinct 13
programme.desc: Isolated and cut off from the city inside a soon-to-be-closed L.A. police station, a group of police officers and convicts join forces to defend themselves against a gang who wants to kill someone trapped inside the precinct.(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Romantic comedy-drama about a pair of American friends (Scarlett Johansson and Rebecca Hall) who vacation together in Spain and fall under the romantic spell of Juan, a passionate artist (Javier Bardem).(n)

programme.title: Henry Rollins: Keep Talking, Pal.
programme.desc: Henry Rollins waxes at a high rate of speed about the brilliance of RuPaul, meeting David Bowie, his weirdest shows, why women should rule and more in a live performance from Portland, Oregon.(n)

programme.title: Chef
programme.desc: When Chef Carl Casper (Jon Favreau) suddenly quits his job at a prominent Los Angeles restaurant after refusing to compromise his creative integrity, he is left to figure out what's next. Finding himself in Miami, he teams up with his ex-wife (Sofia Vergara), his friend (John Leguizamo) and his son (Emjay Anthony) to launch a food truck. Taking to the road, Chef Carl goes back to his roots to reignite his passion for the kitchen for life.(n)

programme.title: Freeway
programme.desc: Vanessa Lutz is a teenage juvenile delinquent living with her prostitute mother and perverted stepfather. Attempting to flee her life, she leaves to go live with her grandmother. While on her way, she meets Bob Wolverton, a charming yet sadistic serial killer. Fearing for her life, she attempts to kill Bob, but only severely disfigures him. Vanessa is sent to prison due to a lack of evidence. Now she must escape and clear her name before he can strike again.(n)

programme.title: TIFFANY HADDISH: SHE READY! From the Hood to Hollywood!
programme.desc: In this hour-long special filmed at the Nate Holden Performing Arts Center, rising comedy star Tiffany Haddish takes the stage in her hometown of Los Angeles to tackle subjects ranging from her early days in foster care and being bullied on the playground, to getting her revenge on ex-boyfriends and introducing Will and Jada Pinkett Smith to Groupon.(n)

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful (La vita e bella)
programme.desc: Guido is a charming, bumbling Jewish waiter whose colorful imagination and playful spirit help him to woo a beautiful schoolteacher. The couple marries and has a young son, but before long, their idyllic world is threatened by Nazi soldiers who force the family into a concentration camp. Guido must now use his imagination again - this time to transform his son's tragic new surroundings into a magical wonderland.(n)

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: New high school student Cameron (Gordon-Levitt) is smitten with Bianca (Oleynik), but in order to get around her father's strict rules on dating, he must get bad boy Patrick (Ledger) to date Bianca's ill-tempered sister, Kat (Stiles).(n)

programme.title: High Hopes
programme.desc: While Rubio gets trumped in Florida, the rest of the candidates remain cautiously optimistic. But are high hopes what they need to pull off a win and secure the nomination - or are they just delusional?(n)

programme.title: Home And Abroad
programme.desc: Foreign policy comes to the fore as the political climate grows fiery in the wake of the attacks in Brussels. As Trump and Clinton prepare to square off, can either of them prove their presidential mettle in handling the heat?(n)

programme.title: On Wisconsin
programme.desc: Ahead of a Wisconsin showdown the candidates crisscross the state in pursuit of competing agendas. Can Kasich, Cruz or Sanders secure their position as spoilers - or will Clinton and Trump finally be crowned their party's Big Cheese?(n)

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life.(n)

programme.title: Home Again
programme.desc: Reese Witherspoon stars as Alice Kinney who is recently separated from her husband. Alice decides to start over by moving back to her hometown of Los Angeles with her two young daughters. During a night out on her 40th birthday, Alice meets three aspiring filmmakers who happen to be in need of a place to live. Alice agrees to let the guys stay in her guest house temporarily, but the arrangement ends up unfolding in unexpected ways.(n)

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: A squadron of vengeful, Nazi-killing Allied soldiers becomes embroiled in a plot to firebomb a Parisian movie theater hosting a film premiere that Adolf Hitler plans to attend in this comically violent World War II action smash starring Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger and Oscar® winner Christoph Waltz.(n)

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first.(n)

programme.title: Soul Men
programme.desc: Estranged backup singers reluctantly embark on a trip to New York where they are to perform in honor of their late band leader, but long-simmering resentments and grudges threaten to scuttle their reunion in this comedy drama starring Samuel L. Jackson and Bernie Mac with Jennifer Coolidge.(n)

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: New high school student Cameron (Gordon-Levitt) is smitten with Bianca (Oleynik), but in order to get around her father's strict rules on dating, he must get bad boy Patrick (Ledger) to date Bianca's ill-tempered sister, Kat (Stiles).(n)

programme.title: I'm Gonna Git You Sucka
programme.desc: After Junebug Spade dies of an overdose of gold chains, Jack Spade returns to avenge his brother's death. Discovering that the infamous Mr. Big has overtaken and overrun the ghetto with his evil ways, Jack reunites a group of onetime superheroes, John Slade, Flyguy, Hammer & Slammer and Kung Fu Joe, to overcome the powerful crime boss in a manhunt that will test their endurance.

programme.title: Tarver vs. Dawson (R)
programme.desc: America's number-one boxing network delivers epic battles featuring Sam Peter, Rafael Marquez, Antonio Tarver, Chad Dawson and other top contenders. Only SHOWTIME delivers the heart-pounding, action-packed live fights boxing fans crave. No wonder ESPN.com raves, "...if you're a serious fight fan, you must have Showtime!".(c)

programme.title: Who Is America?: 106
programme.desc: Comedian Sacha Baron Cohen explores the diverse individuals, from the infamous to the unknown across the political and cultural spectrum, who populate our unique nation.

programme.title: Erotic Amnesia
programme.desc: After a painful breakup, a couple turn to hypnosis to try to erase their memories of each other but while their minds may be clear, their hearts and bodies may never forget so they embark on one night of passion to piece together their love.

programme.title: Windtalkers
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage and Christian Slater star with Adam Beach ("Smoke Signals") in this explosive, patriotic WWII drama about a severely wounded soldier (Cage) who takes on the assignment of safeguarding a "windtalker" (Beach), a Navajo whose dead native language provides an unbreakable code for the military - but whose life is jeopardized with every increasingly bloody battle against the Japanese in the Pacific. Christian Slater, Mark Ruffalo, Brian Van Holt and Noah Emmerich costar in this tense, stylish war epic from director John Woo ("Face/Off").

programme.title: Walking Out
programme.desc: Once a year, fourteen-year-old David (Josh Wiggins) travels from his mother's home in Texas to visit his loner father, Cal (Matt Bomer), in the remote mountains of Montana. There, the two embark on their annual hunting excursion, during which the taciturn Cal attempts to connect with his smartphone-addicted son. But when a terrifying turn of events leaves Cal critically wounded, it's up to the teenage David to summon enough strength for both of them.

programme.title: The Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: An ambitious young journalist (Evan Peters) embeds himself with a dangerous band of pirates in Somalia to get an unfiltered investigative perspective, but his inexperience threatens to derail his plans.

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first.

programme.title: Bleed For This
programme.desc: Boxer Vinny Pazienza (Miles Teller) moves up two weight classes under the guidance of his new trainer Kevin Rooney (Aaron Eckhart). Pazienza takes down French boxer Gilbert Delé to become Super Middleweight Champion. Shortly after the bout however, a head-on car crash leaves him with a broken neck. Initially told he may never walk again, Pazienza chooses a risky "halo" spine-stabilization treatment, requiring him to wear a circular metal brace screwed directly into his skull for six months.

programme.title: Amistad
programme.desc: This movie chronicles the journey of a group of enslaved Africans who overtake their captor's ship and attempt to return to their beloved homeland. When the ship is seized, the captives are brought to the United States where they are charged with murder and await their fate in prison. A courtroom battle ensues that captures the attention of the entire nation. For the men and woman on trial, it's simply a fight for the basic right of freedom. Directed by Steven Spielberg.

programme.title: Henry Rollins: Keep Talking, Pal.
programme.desc: Henry Rollins waxes at a high rate of speed about the brilliance of RuPaul, meeting David Bowie, his weirdest shows, why women should rule and more in a live performance from Portland, Oregon.

programme.title: Lynyrd Skynyrd: If I Leave Here Tomorrow
programme.desc: Featuring rare interviews and never-before-seen archive, this documentary takes viewers on a trip through the history, myth and legend of the greatest American rock band ever. Rising from the swamps of the Deep South, the good ol' boys from Jacksonville, FL came to define an era with their hard rocking boogie-woogie sound, their drunken and dangerous antics and their controversial use of the rebel flag. The film also serves as a portrait of band leader Ronnie Van Zant.

programme.title: The Girl On The Train
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her recent divorce, spends her daily commute fantasizing about the seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes every day. One morning she sees something shocking happen there and becomes entangled in the mystery that unfolds. Emily Blunt, Lisa Kudrow, Justin Theroux and Allison Janney star.

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: A woman emerges from a coma four years after taking a bullet to the head at her own wedding, and goes on an epic vendetta against her former boss and his deadly squad of international assassins in a kill or be-killed fight. Directed by Quentin Tarantino; stars Uma Thurman and Lucy Liu.(n)

programme.title: Lara vs. Trout (R)
programme.desc: Erislandy Lara (18-1-2, 12 KOs) versus Austin Trout (26-1, 14 KOs) for the vacant WBA Super Welterweight Championship. From Brooklyn's Barclays Center. REPLAY.(n)

programme.title: Civil War
programme.desc: Our Cartoon President learns to campaign like a traditional non-racist president with help from Mike Pence while Karen Pence plots her husband's ascent to the presidency.(n)

programme.title: Lynyrd Skynyrd: If I Leave Here Tomorrow
programme.desc: Featuring rare interviews and never-before-seen archive, this documentary takes viewers on a trip through the history, myth and legend of the greatest American rock band ever. Rising from the swamps of the Deep South, the good ol' boys from Jacksonville, FL came to define an era with their hard rocking boogie-woogie sound, their drunken and dangerous antics and their controversial use of the rebel flag. The film also serves as a portrait of band leader Ronnie Van Zant.(n)

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
programme.desc: Coroner Tommy Tilden and son Austin run a morgue and crematorium in Virginia. When the local sheriff brings in a body found in the basement of a home, it seems like just another open-and-shut case. As the autopsy proceeds however, they are left reeling as the inspection brings new revelations. Perfectly preserved on the outside, Jane Doe seems to have been the victim of a horrific ritualistic torture. Tommy and Austin begin to piece together these gruesome discoveries, as an unnatural force takes hold of the crematorium.(n)

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first.(n)

programme.title: 7 Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: A team of scientists made up of Jia (Li Bingbing), Ridley (Kellan Lutz), and Mason (Kelsey Grammer) are in search for a lost colleague in an ancient labyrinth. Before it's too late, the group must battle their way through a swarm of deadly, man-eating funnel web spiders and find out what is behind the arachnids' power and intelligence used to protect a secret powerful elixir.(n)

programme.title: A Season With Navy Football: Episode 4
programme.desc: This week on A SEASON WITH NAVY FOOTBALL, go behind-the-scenes with exclusive on and off the field access to Coach Niumatalolo and USNA's Midshipmen as they face off against the storm of Tulsa's Golden Hurricane.(n)

programme.title: Season With Notre Dame Football, A: Episode 5
programme.desc: The Fighting Irish suffer their first loss of the season in Clemson's Death Valley, prompting Coach Brian Kelly to assert his expectations for the team.(n)

programme.title: Terminal Velocity
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen stars as Ditch Brodie, a daredevil skydiving instructor who falls hard when a sexy, mysterious beauty (Natassja Kinski) walks through his door looking for a lesson and then plunges to her death during a parachute jump. Suddenly, Brodie finds himself hurled headlong into a nightmare world of intrigue and deceit - caught in a deadly game of cat and mouse with the Russian mafia.(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: Ben Affleck takes over the role of hero CIA agent Jack Ryan in this box office hit based on the best-selling novel by Tom Clancy. Low-level analyst Ryan is elevated to prominence by his expertise on an obscure strongman (Ciaran Hinds) after the politician's surprising ascendancy to the Russian presidency. But that's just the tip of a very large, very lethal iceberg involving neo-Nazis and a nuclear warhead smuggled into the U.S. by terrorists. Morgan Freeman, Bridget Moynihan and Liev Schreiber costar in this espionage adventure.(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in this lavish historical drama as German aristocrat Claus von Stauffenberg, a formerly loyal Nazi officer who begins to question his country's motivations and tactics in World War II then hatches a dangerous plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler. Bill Nighy and Kenneth Branagh costar in this fact-based thriller.(n)

programme.title: Killshot
programme.desc: An innocent couple that crosses paths with a professional assassin is forced into the witness protection program while the resourceful killer hunts them down in this crime thriller starring Diane Lane, Mickey Rourke and Thomas Jane.(n)

programme.title: The Loft
programme.desc: Five married men share the only key to a sleek penthouse apartment they use for secret rendezvous with lovers and one-night stands. When Vincent (Karl Urban) unlocks the door one morning to discover a beautiful blonde, naked and dead in the bed, he calls his best friends Chris (James Marsden), Marty (Eric Stonestreet), Luke (Wentworth Miller) and Filip (Matthias Shoenhaerts) to piece together what happened and get their stories straight. But as police close in on their prime suspect, friendships and marriages start to unravel.(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: Ben Affleck takes over the role of hero CIA agent Jack Ryan in this box office hit based on the best-selling novel by Tom Clancy. Low-level analyst Ryan is elevated to prominence by his expertise on an obscure strongman (Ciaran Hinds) after the politician's surprising ascendancy to the Russian presidency. But that's just the tip of a very large, very lethal iceberg involving neo-Nazis and a nuclear warhead smuggled into the U.S. by terrorists. Morgan Freeman, Bridget Moynihan and Liev Schreiber costar in this espionage adventure.(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2
programme.desc: In this sequel to the Quentin Tarantino cult classic, a murderous bride continues her quest for vengeance against her former boss and lover and those who betrayed her, leading up to the ultimate confrontation with the man who ordered her execution. Stars Uma Thurman.(n)

programme.title: ShoBox: The New Generation: 7/20/2018 (R)
programme.desc: The acclaimed SHOWTIME boxing series returns with a stacked slate of undefeated prospects, featuring welterweight Jaron Ennis, lightweight Thomas Mattice and super lightweight Montana Love in separate bouts. REPLAY.(n)

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: Al Pacino stars as Carlito Brigante, a Puerto Rican criminal who vows to go straight and retire. However, his criminal past proves difficult to escape and he ends up being dragged back into crime. Directed by Brian De Palma.(n)

programme.title: The Exorcism of Emily Rose
programme.desc: In an extremely rare decision, the Catholic Church officially recognized the demonic possession of Emily Rose, a 19-year-old Minnesota college freshman. An exorcism was performed and recorded, and that recording played a pivotal role in the events that followed. Told in terrifying flashbacks, this film chronicles the haunting trial of the priest accused of criminal negligence resulting in the death of the young girl believed to be possessed. Starring Laura Linney.(n)

programme.title: The Harvest
programme.desc: A couple who keeps their sick son in a secluded environment find their controlled lives challenged by a young girl who moves in next door. The perfect family is not who they appear to be. Starring Michael Shannon.(n)

programme.title: Season With Notre Dame Football, A: Episode 6
programme.desc: With a spot in the College Football Playoffs potentially hanging in the balance, the Fighting Irish take on one of their longest-standing and fiercest rivals: Navy.(n)

programme.title: Season With Notre Dame Football, A: Episode 7
programme.desc: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish rally for 17 fourth quarter points to defeat the Trojans 41-31 one year after a devastating loss to their archrival.(n)

programme.title: Season of the Witch
programme.desc: Oscar winner Nicolas Cage and Ron Perlman star in this adventure about a heroic Crusader and his fellow soldier who must transport a woman accused of being a witch to a remote monastery. The journey across perilous terrain tests their strength and courage as they discover the girl's secret and find themselves battling a powerful force that will determine the fate of the world.(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Ben Hall
programme.desc: Focusing on the last nine months of Hall's life, when he's a well-established bushranger along with his accomplices, the film explores the relationships within the gang, their robberies and the details surrounding Hall's betrayal and controversial death at the hands of the police on May 5th, 1865. Starring Jack Martin.(n)

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: James Clayton is one of the top prospects in the new crop of CIA recruits. Clayton is given a special assignment and must root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the Agency.(n)

programme.title: Lord of War
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this drama thriller as Yuri Orlov, a Russian immigrant who becomes a millionaire in the Eighties and Nineties by reselling weapons from his politically crumbling homeland to "hot spot" regions around the world, all while marrying a beautiful woman (Bridget Moynahan), dodging a determined federal agent (Ethan Hawke), and occasionally facing the immorality of his chosen profession. Jared Leto and Ian Holm costar in this film from writer/director Andrew Niccol ("Gattaca," "The Truman Show").(n)

programme.title: Get The Gringo
programme.desc: An already bad day for Driver is not getting any better. He makes a big haul of millions that would give him a nice summer vacation on easy street, but it goes south - literally. During a high-speed car chase with the US Border Patrol and a bleeding body in his back seat, Driver flips his car smashing through the border wall, tumbling violently, coming to a stop in Mexico. Apprehended by the Mexican authorities, he is sent to a hard-core prison where he enters the strange and dangerous world of "El Pueblito". Starring Mel Gibson.(n)

programme.title: Season of the Witch
programme.desc: Oscar winner Nicolas Cage and Ron Perlman star in this adventure about a heroic Crusader and his fellow soldier who must transport a woman accused of being a witch to a remote monastery. The journey across perilous terrain tests their strength and courage as they discover the girl's secret and find themselves battling a powerful force that will determine the fate of the world.(n)

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: James Clayton is one of the top prospects in the new crop of CIA recruits. Clayton is given a special assignment and must root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the Agency.(n)

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: Nick, a smooth operator, is trying to land a date with Suzanne, a divorcee with whom he would like to ring in the New Year. Problem is, Suzanne is stuck working in Vancouver and miserable because she misses her kids. Seizing the opportunity, Nick gallantly offers to make her New Year's wish come true - and his own in the process - by driving eight-year-old Kevin and eleven-year-old Lindsey up from Portland, Oregon to be reunited with their mom. What Nick doesn't know is that Suzanne's children hate every man their mom dates on sight.

programme.title: Are We Done Yet?
programme.desc: Now married to Suzanne (Nia Long), Nick Persons (Ice Cube) has bought a quiet suburban house to escape the rat race of the big city and to provide more space for his new wife and kids. But when his new home quickly becomes a costly fixer upper and he finds himself at the mercy of an eccentric contractor (John C. McGinley), Nick's suburban dream soon becomes a nightmare.

programme.title: A Better Life
programme.desc: Carlos Galindo (Demian Bichir) dreamed of good things for his wife and son when they crossed the border into the US. After his wife leaves him, Carlos' only goal was to make sure his son Luis was given the opportunities he never had. After years of hard work, he still finds himself drifting apart from Luis, now a teenager, who is susceptible to peer pressures. Carlos borrows what little money he can and invests it all into his own gardening business, hoping to finally achieve the better life he always envisioned for his son.

programme.title: Drunkboat
programme.desc: A young teenager, Abe (Jacob Zachar), manipulates the unsuspecting help of his alcoholic Uncle Mort (John Malkovich) to buy a boat from a con man named Mr. Fletcher (John Goodman).

programme.title: Kelly's Hollywood
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the intimate story of an aspiring actor who brings his sister, born with Down syndrome, out to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a Hollywood diva. But as her health begins to fail and she becomes increasing jealous of his fiancée, he is forced to confront his co-dependent sibling relationship and the threat it is posing to his engagement.

programme.title: Swing Away
programme.desc: Following a meltdown that leads to a suspension, professional golfer Zoe Papadopoulos travels to her grandparents' village in Greece to escape the harsh spotlight of the international sports world. Between baking bread and eating baklava, she meets and mentors a ten-year-old girl who is determined to become the next golf sensation. Along the way, Zoe rediscovers her Greek heritage, her love of the game and the hidden strength within herself.

programme.title: Daisy
programme.desc: A thirteen-year-old girl named Daisy (Hattie Gotobed), who suffers from terminal Epidermolysis Bullosa, meets Stinky (Max Brown), a British war veteran and drug addict. Like Peter Pan, Stinky is stuck in Neverland and like Wendy, Daisy inspires him to change his ways - helping him learn to appreciate life, find hope and find the kind of love that she knows she will never get to experience.

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication.

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first.

programme.title: Cody the Robosapien
programme.desc: When a 12-year-old boy discovers a broken robot, he finds a zany and powerful new best friend who can change his life for the better but when the evil corporation that funded the robot's creation intervenes, the pair must team up to save their family.

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather.

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork.

programme.title: Fair Haven
programme.desc: A young piano prodigy returns to his family farm, after a long stay in a gay conversion therapy, and is torn between the expectations of his emotionally distant father and the memory of a past, loving relationship he's tried to bury.

programme.title: All Styles
programme.desc: A young hip hop artist is rejected by his old dance crew for heading off to college before a major competition. As a result, he assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former friends.

programme.title: Heartbeats
programme.desc: A feisty American hip hop dancer travels to India with her family for a wedding and falls in love - both with a new style of dance, and with the determined young man who introduces it to her.

programme.title: The Beaver
programme.desc: When his toy company nears bankruptcy and his wife kicks him out of his house, CEO Walter Black (Mel Gibson) unsuccessfully attempts suicide. Hitting a psychological rock bottom, Walter adopts a discarded beaver hand puppet and begins communicating with the world through this alternate personality, an oddball tactic that allows him to slowly reconnect with his family and rebuild his broken spirit. Jodie Foster and Anton Yelchin costar in this quirky drama.(n)

programme.title: A Rumor of Angels
programme.desc: Haunted by the car accident that claimed his mother's life, a 12-year-old Maine boy (Trevor Morgan) befriends an eccentric local woman (Vanessa Redgrave), whose presence in his life galvanizes his fractured family. Ray Liotta, Catherine McCormack and Ron Livingston costar in this drama based on the book "Thy Son Liveth: Messages from a Soldier to His Mother" by Grace Duffie.(n)

programme.title: Festival in Cannes
programme.desc: Dazzling Mediterranean vistas frame this wry and acerbic tale of cinema art versus mass-market commerce from Henry Jaglom. A legendary European screen star (Anouk Aimee) becomes the decisive player in a face-off pitting an actress-turned-independent filmmaker (Greta Scacchi) against a high-powered Hollywood producer (Ron Silver), both of whom are trying to put together deals for prospective film projects at the Cannes Film Festival. "A giddy comic fantasy, full of romance, chicanery and beguiling, sophisticated players" - "Los Angeles Times.".(n)

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather.(n)

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder.(n)

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town.(n)

programme.title: Running Wild
programme.desc: A retired Air Force Major (Gregory Harrison), now a UN observer for the International Wildlife Organization, and his children confront elephant poachers in Zimbabwe. Simon MacCorkindale, Cody Jones and Brooke Nevin costar.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home.(n)

programme.title: Spy Kids 2: The Island of Lost Dreams
programme.desc: Super-spy siblings Carmen and Juni (Alexa Vega and Daryl Sabara) are back to rid the world of another villainous menace in this sci-fi action sequel from writer/director Robert Rodriguez ("El Mariachi"). This time, the Cortez kids - now official government agents - are assigned to find and stop the nefarious energy-sapping plans of Romero (Steve Buscemi), a mad scientist whose tropical island lair is populated with mutant experiments-gone-awry. Antonio Banderas, Carla Gugino, Ricardo Montalban and Holland Taylor costar.(n)

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: Jess and Leslie couldn't be more different—she's rich, he's poor, she's from the city, he's from the country—but when Leslie begins to open up the world of imagination to Jess, they find they have something amazing to share: the kingdom of Terabithia, a realm of giants, ogres and other enchanted beings that can only be accessed by boldly swinging across a stream in the woods on a strand of rope. Here, Leslie and Jess rule as King and Queen among the incredible creatures they create, and not even the forces of evil can break their bond.(n)

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.(n)

programme.title: Bigfoot and the Burtons
programme.desc: When an ignored little boy bonds with Bigfoot and discovers the human-like ape is in danger, he finds the courage to stand up to those bigger than him to save the creature and set his new friend free.(n)

programme.title: Running Wild
programme.desc: A retired Air Force Major (Gregory Harrison), now a UN observer for the International Wildlife Organization, and his children confront elephant poachers in Zimbabwe. Simon MacCorkindale, Cody Jones and Brooke Nevin costar.(n)

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: Jess and Leslie couldn't be more different—she's rich, he's poor, she's from the city, he's from the country—but when Leslie begins to open up the world of imagination to Jess, they find they have something amazing to share: the kingdom of Terabithia, a realm of giants, ogres and other enchanted beings that can only be accessed by boldly swinging across a stream in the woods on a strand of rope. Here, Leslie and Jess rule as King and Queen among the incredible creatures they create, and not even the forces of evil can break their bond.(n)

programme.title: Spy Kids 2: The Island of Lost Dreams
programme.desc: Super-spy siblings Carmen and Juni (Alexa Vega and Daryl Sabara) are back to rid the world of another villainous menace in this sci-fi action sequel from writer/director Robert Rodriguez ("El Mariachi"). This time, the Cortez kids - now official government agents - are assigned to find and stop the nefarious energy-sapping plans of Romero (Steve Buscemi), a mad scientist whose tropical island lair is populated with mutant experiments-gone-awry. Antonio Banderas, Carla Gugino, Ricardo Montalban and Holland Taylor costar.(n)

programme.title: Mission to Mars
programme.desc: In the year 2020, the first manned mission to Mars, commanded by Luke Graham (Don Cheadle), lands safely on the red planet, but is soon met with catastrophe. Haunted by a cryptic last message from Graham, NASA launches the Mars Recovery Mission to investigate and bring back survivors. Confronted with nearly insurmountable dangers, but propelled by deep friendship, the team finally lands on Mars and makes a discovery that explains everything.(n)

programme.title: Surviving The Wild
programme.desc: Following the untimely death of his grandpa Gus (Jon Voight), thirteen-year-old Shaun (Aidan Cullen) disregards his parent's wishes and embarks on a journey with his dog Riley, to spread his grandpa's ashes in the wild. Throughout the journey, Shaun is guided by the spirit of his grandfather. Together they overcome challenge after challenge, as Shaun traverses white water rapids and tries to evade two crazed hillbillies that are on his tail.(n)

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of two ordinary inner-city kids who chase the dream of professional basketball glory. Filmed over a five-year period, the two young boys navigate the complex, competitive world of scholastic athletics while striving to overcome the intense pressures of family life and the realities of their Chicago streets.(n)

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.(n)

programme.title: Knockin' on Dave's Door
programme.desc: Music legend Bob Dylan flies to London one day to visit his mate Dave Stewart. After getting lost, Bob finally arrives at the address and finds himself waiting for Dave in his flat dutifully being served tea by his girlfriend. But is he really in the right place? Starring Eddie Marsan, Paul Ritter and Katherine Parkinson.(n)

programme.title: Shifting Gears
programme.desc: Tom is a hard-working manager at a big box super store. He started in the stock room, always imagining himself at the helm. Now poised for a big promotion, he gets the news he always feared: no college degree means no promotion. In the face of this new reality, and lamenting the time he devoted to work over family, Tom and his wife Carol decide to change course and start a family business. They pack up their kids and move to a small town to take over a run-down garage bequeathed to them by Tom's estranged father.(n)

programme.title: The Longshots
programme.desc: A former high school football star gets his self-respect back when he lands a job coaching the local Pop Warner team with his athletically gifted niece as quarterback. Ice Cube stars in this sports comedy with Keke Palmer and Dash Mihok.(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong.(n)

programme.title: The Emperor's New Clothes
programme.desc: An ingenious game of "what if" lies at the heart of this gentle comedy/fantasy directed by Alan Taylor. In this alternative take on history, Napoleon (Ian Holm in a dual role) escapes exile on St. Helena when he and his supporters convince a minor deck-hand to double for him in captivity. The emperor will return to France, the ruse will be revealed, and Napoleon will return to power. Or that's the plan. Alas, it seems captivity has its allures and Bonaparte's doppelganger begins to enjoy his new persona. "Delightful" - "Los Angeles Times.".(n)

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).(n)

programme.title: The Longshots
programme.desc: A former high school football star gets his self-respect back when he lands a job coaching the local Pop Warner team with his athletically gifted niece as quarterback. Ice Cube stars in this sports comedy with Keke Palmer and Dash Mihok.(n)

programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Romantic comedy-drama about a pair of American friends (Scarlett Johansson and Rebecca Hall) who vacation together in Spain and fall under the romantic spell of Juan, a passionate artist (Javier Bardem).

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.

programme.title: Queen of the Desert
programme.desc: Gertrude Bell (Nicole Kidman) rejects the stifling rigidity of life in turn-of-the-century England, leaving it behind for a chance to travel to Tehran. She begins her lifelong adventure across the Arab world, a journey marked by danger, a passionate affair with a British officer (James Franco), and an encounter with the legendary T.E. Lawrence (Robert Pattinson).

programme.title: Whale Rider
programme.desc: In a small coastal village, the Maori descend from Paikea, the Whale Rider. In every generation, a male heir has succeeded to the chiefly title. When twins are born, and the boy twin dies, the chief is unable to accept his grand-daughter, Pai, as a future leader. Koro, the chief, is convinced that the tribe's misfortunes began at Pai's birth and calls for people to bring their sons to him, sure a new leader will emerge. Pai loves Koro more than anyone in the world, but she must fight him and a thousand years of tradition to fulfill her destiny.

programme.title: Lady Psycho Killer
programme.desc: A knife-wielding killer is on the loose in a small town slicing and dicing men of questionable intent. As her brutality leaves the town littered with corpses, her bloodlust is lost on her young lover who pursues her anyway.

programme.title: The Fantasticks
programme.desc: Joel Grey and Brad Sullivan are small-town fathers conspiring to bring their children together in a love match by pretending to discourage it in this magical musical costarring Barnard Hughes.

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home.

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart stars as a young woman who joins the military to escape her small town roots but ends up as a rookie guard at Guantanamo Bay where she strikes up an unusual and life changing friendship with one of the detainees.

programme.title: Certain Women
programme.desc: Michelle Williams, Kristen Stewart and Laura Dern star as three women striving to forge their own paths amidst the wide-open plains of the American Northwest. The lawyer (Dern) finds herself contending with both office sexism and a hostage situation. The wife and mother (Williams) has determination to build her dream home which puts her at odds with the men in her life. The young law student (Stewart) forms an ambiguous bond with a lonely ranch hand (Lily Gladstone).

programme.title: To Have And To Hold
programme.desc: Tara and Charmaine visit the woman from Tara's memories; Marshall starts to fall for Lionel; Kate tries to change herself for Zach, her new man; Neil leaves town; a new alternate personality arrives.(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Mild Violence

programme.title: From This Day Forward
programme.desc: In the Season 2 finale, it's Charmaine and Nick's wedding day but Tara confronts her parents about her childhood memories; Kate and Marshall uncover a secret that could derail everything.(c)

programme.title: The Architect
programme.desc: Parker Posey and Eric McCormack star in this comedy about a couple who set out to build a new home and enlist the services of an uncompromising modernist architect who proceeds to build his dream house, instead of theirs.

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong.

programme.title: Don't Sleep
programme.desc: Shawn and Zach are young lovers who move into a guesthouse together on an estate owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marino. When bizarre events begin to occur, Zach slowly remembers a forgotten time in his childhood when he suffered from severe and violent psychosis - memories erased by a series of electroconvulsive shock treatments administered by his psychiatrist. As the terrors surrounding their lives grow to deadly proportions, Zach is forced to question his own sanity.

programme.title: The Sense of an Ending
programme.desc: Tony Webster (Jim Broadbent) lives a reclusive existence in London, until he learns that a diary has been left to him by the recently deceased mother (Emily Mortimer) of an ex-girlfriend (Charlotte Rampling). As Webster investigates the diary, he is forced to face the truth about his first love and the consequences of decisions made a lifetime ago, while attempting to resolve his strained relationships with his ex-wife (Harriet Walter) and their pregnant daughter (Michelle Dockery).

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Pop music sensation Britney Spears stars in this teen road-trip drama about a trio of high school pals that heads for the bright lights of Los Angeles, meeting up with both romance and loss along the way. Zoe Saldana, Taryn Manning, Anson Mount, Dan Aykroyd and Kim Cattrall costar in this film from director Tamra Davis ("Billy Madison").(n)

programme.title: Autumn In New York
programme.desc: A wealthy, charismatic New York restaurateur (Richard Gere) falls for a much younger hat designer (Winona Ryder) but their relationship is complicated by his philandering ways, his past connection to her family, and her debilitating illness. Jill Hennessey, Anthony LaPaglia, Sherry Stringfield and Elaine Stritch costar in this romantic melodrama.(n)

programme.title: Jasper Jones
programme.desc: Toni Collette, Hugo Weaving, Levi Miller, Angourie Rice, Dan Wyllie and Aaron McGrath star in the story of Charlie Bucktin, a bookish boy of 14 living in a small town in Western Australia. In the dead of night during the scorching summer of 1969, Charlie is startled when he is woken by local mixed-race outcast Jasper Jones outside his window. Jasper leads him deep into the forest and shows him something that will change his life forever, setting them both on a dangerous journey to solve a mystery that will consume the entire community.(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong.(n)

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.(n)

programme.title: A Rising Tide
programme.desc: After the destruction of his family's restaurant during Hurricane Sandy, a young chef (Hunter Parrish) must grow up quickly, taking the biggest risks of his life both in business and love. Life starts to go his way when he meets a wealthy patron (Tim Daly) and has a chance encounter with Sarah (Ashley Hinshaw). As a chain of unexpected events unfolds for all of them, as they discover the only way to achieve their dreams may be to acknowledge what they owe to others - and let destiny take its course.(n)

programme.title: Lost Cat Corona
programme.desc: Dominic likes to play it safe, but Dom's M.O. is tested when his wife's cat goes missing and he sets out on a quest to find him. Over the course of one day, Dom endures neighborhood mayhem at every turn. He meets a deranged psychopath, endures a sideshow of a wake, and becomes unwittingly involved in the exchange of illegal knockoff handbags. As the day nears the end, a confrontation with a pair of badass teens forces Dom to face the issues that have been holding him hostage his entire life.(n)

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel.(n)

programme.title: Miles To Go Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Short documentary chronicling the true story of famed musicians and the relationships they have with their roadies. Features music legends Chad Smith (Red Hot Chili Peppers), Chris Shiflett (Foo Fighters) and Jim James (My Morning Jacket), who speak candidly about their time on the road and the importance of the crew who work tirelessly to put the show together, as well as capturing a day behind-the-scenes with the crew of Pearl Jam.(n)

programme.title: Prince: Sign 'o' the Times
programme.desc: This concert film features clips of live stage performances from Rotterdam and Minnesota, and is also interspersed with short films from the artist. Fan favorites, such as 'Little Red Corvette' and 'U Got the Look,' are performed as Prince is accompanied on stage by Sheena Easton and drummer Sheila E.(n)

programme.title: ...youwillnotwin...
programme.desc: In the Season 3 premiere, Tara decides to finish the last few credits she needs to earn her college degree, but Max worries the stress will trigger a transition to one of her alters; Kate tries to plan the next phase of her life; Charmaine is pregnant but still avoids committing to Neil; Marshall and Lionel purchase a video camera together for filmmaking class.(n)

programme.title: Crackerjack
programme.desc: Tara transitions into her psychiatrist alter Shoshanna in her Abnormal Psychology class and is humiliated by her professor; Max considers an offer to sell his business to a competitor, which would put his best friend Neil out of a job just as he's moving in with Charmaine; Kate considers an opportunity to teach English in Japan, which thrills neither of her parents.(n)

programme.title: Pretty Persuasion
programme.desc: When high school student Kimberly Joyce accuses her English teacher of sexual harassment, she turns her exclusive Beverly Hills private school, and everything else in her wake, upside down. Hell hath no fury like a teenager scorned.(n)

programme.title: Contracted
programme.desc: Samantha (Townsend) is a twenty‐something party girl with little discipline and even less direction. After experiencing a lapse in her relationship with her lover (Stegeman), she's forced to move back in with her overbearing mother (Williams). Things take a turn for the worse when she spends the night with a mysterious man (Barrett), leaving her hung‐over and guilt‐ridden. However, something else is wrong with Samantha and she's infected. Unsure of the disease, she realizes she is the host of something catastrophic.(n)

programme.title: Jackson
programme.desc: An intimate documentary look into the lives of three women caught up in the complex issues surrounding access to reproductive healthcare in the Deep South: Shannon Brewer, director of Jackson Women's Health Organization, the only remaining abortion clinic in Mississippi; Barbara Beaver, a leader of the anti-abortion movement, who runs the Center for Pregnancy Choices; and April Jackson, a young mother of four faced with another unplanned pregnancy.(n)

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz.(n)

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life.(n)

programme.title: George Michael: Freedom
programme.desc: Documentary covering the span of his career, but concentrating on the formative period in the late Grammy Award winner's life, leading up to and following the making of his acclaimed album 'Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1' and the subsequent High Court battle with his record label that followed, while also becoming poignantly personal about the death of his late partner and first love, Anselmo Feleppa. Filmed before Michael's untimely passing, the film is narrated by him, who was heavily involved in the making of it.(n)

programme.title: Prince: Sign 'o' the Times
programme.desc: This concert film features clips of live stage performances from Rotterdam and Minnesota, and is also interspersed with short films from the artist. Fan favorites, such as 'Little Red Corvette' and 'U Got the Look,' are performed as Prince is accompanied on stage by Sheena Easton and drummer Sheila E.(n)

programme.title: Dogville
programme.desc: Provocative and emotionally demanding, Lars von Trier's controversial allegory about the darker side of human nature and American arrogance has been likened to a hellish version of "Our Town." Into a small town - represented by chalk outlines and a few props - arrives a stranger (Nicole Kidman) in need of sanctuary. Initially welcoming, Dogville's citizens show their true colors once they listen to their paranoiac fears. This winner of more than 10 international awards costars Paul Bettany, James Caan, Patricia Clarkson and Lauren Bacall.(n)

programme.title: The Autopsy of Jane Doe
programme.desc: Coroner Tommy Tilden and son Austin run a morgue and crematorium in Virginia. When the local sheriff brings in a body found in the basement of a home, it seems like just another open-and-shut case. As the autopsy proceeds however, they are left reeling as the inspection brings new revelations. Perfectly preserved on the outside, Jane Doe seems to have been the victim of a horrific ritualistic torture. Tommy and Austin begin to piece together these gruesome discoveries, as an unnatural force takes hold of the crematorium.(n)

programme.title: Cursed to Kill
programme.desc: Rachel awakens in a hospital, paralyzed from the waist down after a failed attempt on her life for abandoning a cult suicide. Her suffering grows as the spirits of the deceased members begin to haunt her within the confines of the hospital room. They threaten to kill her unless she is willing to offer up a kindred soul in place of her own - her brother's child. But the week that Rachel is given to make her decision is tethered to a curse. All who have the misfortune of hearing anything she says are met with a swift and violent death.(n)

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town.(n)

programme.title: Queen of the Desert
programme.desc: Gertrude Bell (Nicole Kidman) rejects the stifling rigidity of life in turn-of-the-century England, leaving it behind for a chance to travel to Tehran. She begins her lifelong adventure across the Arab world, a journey marked by danger, a passionate affair with a British officer (James Franco), and an encounter with the legendary T.E. Lawrence (Robert Pattinson).(n)

programme.title: The Full F**K You Finger
programme.desc: The stress of juggling school and Charmaine's baby shower causes Tara to transition, with negative consequences for Charmaine; to sell the family business, Max must get the approval of his eccentric mother (guest star Frances Conroy); Kate meets a flight attendant who inspires a new idea about her future.(n)

programme.title: Wheels
programme.desc: Tara and Charmaine are rushed to the hospital in the same ambulance, where Charmaine declares her baby off limits to her crazy sister; Tara attempts to make a deal with her alters, which intrigues her Abnormal Psychology professor; Marshall, Lionel and Noah put Charmaine's empty house to some creative uses; Kate is embarrassed to confess that she backed out of going to Japan.(n)

programme.title: It Stains The Sands Red
programme.desc: In the throes of a zombie apocalypse, Molly - a troubled woman from Las Vegas with a dark past - finds herself stranded in the desert with a ravenous zombie on her tail. At first, she's easily able to outpace her undead pursuer, but things quickly become worse when she realizes the zombie doesn't need to ever stop and rest. Running low on supplies and beat down by the harsh environment, Molly must summon strength she never knew she had in order to face it.(n)

programme.title: You, Me and Him
programme.desc: Two female lovers, one a career driven lawyer (Lucy Punch), the other a fun-loving, pot-smoking layabout (Faye Marsay), have an annoying Casanova neighbor (David Tennant). While neither woman ever wanted children, both end up pregnant, creating conflicts that cause each to re-examine their outlook on life and their relationship.(n)
